total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the positions of the number 5 in the input grid.
Q2: For each position of 5, create a 2x2 grid with the pattern [[1,2],[2,1]].
Q3: Combine these 2x2 grids to form the output grid, maintaining the relative positions of the original 5s in the input grid.
Q4: If there is no 5 in the corresponding position in the input grid, fill the corresponding position in the output grid with 0s.
